content: I want to propose to have bi-weekly meetings on tuesday 8pm UTC, starting next week and suspend the current meetings we have to follow an async process. Does that works @WG-prioritization ?
/me goes to look up what UTC is in their timezone
I might have a hard time attending but I'll try
@pnkfelix in general or next week?
we can try to find a different time
in general, at least while the kids are still at home
but maybe that will stop in a month or two

(the main issue is that 4 pm is around the time that we sort of hit the wall with the kids; that, and we need to start on preparing dinner, etc. basically its very hard to be to have non-afk time starting around 4 or 4:30)
if possible I would prefer an hour earlier (1900 UTC) but 2000 is fine by me as well
I can't an hour earlier because there's a WG Rustc Dev Guide meeting
what do you guys prefer to do?, can try to find a different time, maybe creating a doodle or should we stick with that time?
have created the event for now for next tuesday 8pm UTC and then repeating it every 2 weeks
and just in case, meetings on wednesday are cancelled, let's try to do a full day async work during wednesdays, so people can jump in when they can
